java.lang.Object
FileIO
public class FileIO extends Object
Handles file based operations

  • Constructor Details

    • FileIO

      public FileIO(String filepath) throws NullPointerException
      Parameters:
      filepath - path to the file as String
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - passthrough exception from File class

    • FileIO

      public FileIO(String filepath, Boolean readonly) throws NullPointerException
      Parameters:
      filepath - path to the file as String
      readonly - True read only (default), False writable
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - passthrough exception from the File class

  • Method Details

    • exists

      public boolean exists()
      Returns:
      True if and only if the file or directory denoted by this abstract pathname exists

    • canReadNext

      public boolean canReadNext() throws FileIOException
      Returns:
      whether there is another token to read from the file
      Throws:
      FileIOException - if file could not be opened with FileInputStream

    • readNext

      public String readNext() throws FileIOException
      Returns:
      next token read from the file as String
      Throws:
      FileIOException - if file could not be opened with FileInputStream

    • canReadNextLine

      public boolean canReadNextLine() throws FileIOException
      Returns:
      whether this is another line to read from the file
      Throws:
      FileIOException - if file could not be opened with FileInputStream

    • readNextLine

      public String readNextLine() throws FileIOException
      Returns:
      the remainder of the current line as String
      Throws:
      FileIOException - if file could not be opened with FileInputStream

    • readContentsAsArray

      public ArrayList<String> readContentsAsArray() throws FileIOException
      Returns:
      the entire file contents as an ArrayList of Strings
      Throws:
      FileIOException - if file could not be opened with FileInputStream

    • closeReader

      public void closeReader()
      Closes the Scanner instance for file reading

    • resetReader

      public void resetReader() throws FileIOException
      Close and restarts the Scanner instance for file reading
      Throws:
      FileIOException - if file could not be opened with FileInputStream

    • setWritable

      public FileIO setWritable()
      Enables file writing operations by setting readonly to False
      Returns:
      FileIO to chain methods

    • overwrite

      public void overwrite(String text) throws FileIOException
      Writes to the file by replacing its current contents
      Parameters:
      text - the string text to write to the file
      Throws:
      FileIOException - if file could not be opened with FileOutputStream

    • writeLine

      public void writeLine(String text) throws FileIOException
      Appends one line of string text to the file
      Parameters:
      text - the string text to write to the file
      Throws:
      FileIOException - if file could not be opened with FileOutputStream

    • writeObject

      public void writeObject(Object obj) throws FileIOException
      Writes an object to file
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to write to file
      Throws:
      FileIOException - if an error occurs while writing the file

    • readObject

      public Object readObject() throws FileIOException
      Reads an object from file
      Returns:
      an object read from file
      Throws:
      FileIOException - if an error occurs while reading the file

    • close

      public void close()
      Clean up operations

    • delete

      public boolean delete() throws SecurityException
      Delete the file if required
      Returns:
      True if file is successfull deleted
      Throws:
      SecurityException - file could not be accessed due to security settings
